DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , non-therapeutic study compare relative utility multiple ocular imaging modality detection cellular immune response patient AMD related disorder .
DOC.brief_title: The Role Inflammation AMD Related Disorders
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria STUDY EYE Any tentative clinical diagnosis follow : 1 . Early dry AMD ( drusen ) clinical suspicion CNV 2 . Late dry AMD ( GA ) clinical suspicion CNV 3 . Reticular Pseudodrusen clinical suspicion CNV 4 . Polypoidal choroidal vasculopathy 5 . Retinal Angiomatous Proliferation 6 . Central Serous Retinopathy 7 . RPE detachment 8 . Conversion wet AMD ( CNV ) 9 . Decade matched control Inclusion Criteria CONTROL EYE Subjects > 18 year age Best correct visual acuity ( BCVA ) 20/32 good Exclusion Criteria STUDY/CONTROL EYE : Patients able provide consent study . Patients poor view fundus due cataract vitreous hemorrhage . Patients < 18 year age Patients know allergy angiographic dye Patients concurrent unrelated eye diagnosis would interfere image acquisition interpretation ( eg advance diabetic retinopathy , vascular occlusion , uveitis , others ) . Exclusion Criteria CONTROL EYE Suspect diagnosis AMD , RPD , PCV , RAP , CSR RPED Family history AMD 2 large drusen ( > 125um ) 20 medium drusen ( 64124um ) Diabetes Patients use Plaquenil/Chloroquine/Hydroxychloroquine Diagnosis inflammatory disease Patients inherit eye disease Note : patient diagnosis nevi NOT exclude study
